Text: Just "Movie" is a missleading term, this is a short-movie, because it's estimately like  10 minutes long (can't remember the exact lenght, but it is very short). This is an ok film though. Nothing revolutioning.
This is a technology preview movie. It showcases what's achievable with Blender. You can download the movie also at http://www.elephantsdream.org/ and http://www.blender.org/ .
